[fly-list] [tag flag build][/tag] [item-description] __LOGOBAR__ __MENUBAR__ __LEFTSIDE__ [comment] This the special "flypage". When a page is called that corresponds to a part number in the database, and that page doesn't exist, this page is used to display it. Everywhere you see [item-code] the part number will be displayed. [item-field title] displays the title field in the products database. [item-data products title] is the same in this case, but if the products database contained more than one table (with ProductFiles) then [item-field title] could come from another table. [/comment]
